RelatedSentence: This has been stated by President Alexander Lukashenko at a meeting with Director General of the Organization Ahmet Üzümcü .
A few hours earlier , the distinguished guest met with Foreign Minister of Belarus Vladimir Makey .
All the initiatives of Belarus are supported by the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons .

A1: ships provided by Denmark and Norway
RelatedSentence: About 92 percent of the chemical weapons located in the country 's territory are ready to be removed on ships provided by Denmark and Norway .
